description: System-generated unique identifier for this saved filter record.
Technical name of the report, view, or object the filter applies to.
User-assigned title used to select this saved filter in the application.
Optional notes describing the filterâ€™s intent, scope, or criteria for business users.
Login or username of the user who initially created the filter.
Application area where this filter is available (for example, Reporting).
Serialized definition of the filter criteria (likely XML), including conditions and parameters; confirm structure with SME.
Date and time when the filter was last updated.
Username of the person who last changed the filter; may be blank if unknown.
Flag indicating whether the filter is private to the owner or shared with others; encoding may vary (confirm).
Internal user identifier for the creator; likely foreign key to a user directory; confirm with SME.
Timestamp when the filter was first created by a user.
Internal user identifier for the most recent modifier; likely references a user record; confirm with SME.
Timestamp of the most recent user-driven modification.
